mapper.select: select fsuId,fsuIp from xhgmnet_emh_login group by fsuId
select deviceId from xhgmnet_emh_config where fsuId=#{FSUID}
select count(*) from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_status where fsuId=#{FSUID}
select serialNo,alarmTime from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_alarm where serialNo=#{serialNo}

select deviceId,count(deviceId) as alarmNum,deviceName from (select a.*,b.deviceName from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_alarm as a LEFT JOIN xhgmnet_emh_device as b on a.deviceId=b.deviceId GROUP BY serialNo) as c GROUP BY deviceId
select alarmlevel,count(alarmlevel) as alarmNum from (select * from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_alarm GROUP BY serialNo) as a GROUP BY alarmlevel
mapper.update: update xhgmnet_emh_camera set deviceIP=#{FSUIP} where fsuId=#{FSUID}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.fsuId,b.siteId,b.fsuIp from xhgmnet_bs_station as a LEFT JOIN (select x.fsuId,y.siteId,y.siteName,x.fsuIp from xhgmnet_emh_login as x LEFT JOIN xhgmnet_emh_config as y on x.fsuId=y.fsuId GROUP BY x.fsuId) as b on a.bsId=b.siteId where a.lat !=0 and a.bsId<=2038
